channel.title: Piazza San Marco on MyThinkPond

item.title: Pictures from the Royal Palace Museum in Piazza San Marco, Venice, Italy
item.description: Here are some pictures I took from the Royal Palace Museum in Piazza San Marco, Venice, Italy [map] Shows you some of the wonderful Christian relics and how the royal family in Venice, Italy was involved in exploration of the new world, seafaring and art.
